title: Vector Store Configuration
description: Configuration for TypedAI vector search indexing. Can be a single object or array of objects for multiple configurations.
name: main

_comments.name: Name of the configuration (required when using multiple configs). Maps to the vector store collection name. Must be alphanumeric with dashes/underscores only.
_comments.gcpProject: GCP project ID for Discovery Engine (overrides GCLOUD_PROJECT env var)
_comments.gcpRegion: GCP region for Vertex AI embedding service (overrides GCLOUD_REGION env var, default: 'us-central1')
_comments.discoveryEngineLocation: Discovery Engine location: 'global', 'us', or 'eu' (overrides DISCOVERY_ENGINE_LOCATION env var, default: 'global')
_comments.discoveryEngineCollectionId: Discovery Engine collection ID (overrides DISCOVERY_ENGINE_COLLECTION_ID env var, default: 'default_collection')
_comments.datastoreId: Discovery Engine datastore ID where documents are indexed (overrides DISCOVERY_ENGINE_DATA_STORE_ID env var)
_comments.dualEmbedding: Enable dual embedding (code + natural language). 12% better retrieval, 3x cost.
_comments.contextualChunking: Enable LLM-generated context. 49-67% better retrieval with ~1.2x cost thanks to the single-call contextualizer.
_comments.reranking: Enable post-search reranking for better result quality
_comments.includePatterns: Glob patterns to include during indexing (e.g., ['src/**', 'lib/**']). If not specified, all supported files are indexed (excluding common build/dependency directories).
_comments.maxFileSize: Maximum file size in bytes to index (default: 1MB)
